dt: {bc}a wheeled vehicle for moving heavy articles: such as
{bc}a strong horse-drawn or automotive vehicle (such as a pickup) for hauling
{bc}an automotive vehicle with a short chassis equipped with a swivel for attaching a trailer and used especially for the highway hauling of freight
{bc}a small barrow consisting of a rectangular frame having at one end a pair of handles and at the other end a pair of small heavy wheels and a projecting edge to slide under a load
{bc}a small heavy rectangular frame supported on four wheels for moving heavy objects
{bc}a small flat-topped car pushed or pulled by hand
{bc}a swiveling carriage consisting of a frame with one or more pairs of wheels and springs to carry and guide one end (as of a railroad car) in turning sharp curves
{bc}a small strong wheel for a gun carriage
{bc}a small wooden cap at the top of a flagstaff or masthead usually having holes for reeving flag or signal halyards

et: probably back-formation from {it}truckle{/it} small wheel {ma}{mat|truckle bed|}{/ma}
shortdef: a wheeled vehicle for moving heavy articles: such as
a strong horse-drawn or automotive vehicle (such as a pickup) for hauling
an automotive vehicle with a short chassis equipped with a swivel for attaching a trailer and used especially for the highway hauling of freight; also : a truck with attached trailer

dt: {bc}to load or transport on a truck
{bc}to roll along especially in an easy untroubled way
{bc}to be employed in driving a truck

shortdef: to load or transport on a truck
to roll along especially in an easy untroubled way

dt: {bc}to barter or dispose of by barter
{bc}to negotiate or traffic especially in an underhanded way {bc}have dealings

et: Middle English {it}trukken{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}*truker, *troker{/it}, from Vulgar Latin {it}*troccare{/it}, probably of imitative origin
shortdef: to barter or dispose of by barter

dt: {bc}commodities appropriate for barter or for small trade
{bc}payment of wages in goods instead of cash
{bc}heterogeneous small articles often of little value

shortdef: commodities appropriate for barter or for small trade

dt: {bc}a farm devoted to the production of vegetables for the market

shortdef: a farm devoted to the production of vegetables for the market

dt: {bc}a facility especially for truckers that is usually by a highway and that includes a diner, fuel pumps, and a garage

shortdef: a facility especially for truckers that is usually by a highway and that includes a diner, fuel pumps, and a garage

dt: {bc}the system of paying wages in goods instead of cash

shortdef: the system of paying wages in goods instead of cash

dt: {bc}an automotive truck for the transportation of bulk material that has a body which tilts to dump its contents

shortdef: an automotive truck for the transportation of bulk material that has a body which tilts to dump its contents

dt: {bc}an automotive vehicle equipped with firefighting apparatus

shortdef: an automotive vehicle equipped with firefighting apparatus
